Uses of Class
org.jgrapes.util.events.KeyValueStoreUpdate

Packages that use KeyValueStoreUpdate
Package Description
org.jgrapes.util.events  

  • Uses of KeyValueStoreUpdate in org.jgrapes.util.events

    Methods in org.jgrapes.util.events that return KeyValueStoreUpdate
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    KeyValueStoreUpdate KeyValueStoreUpdate.clearAll​(String... segments)
    Adds a new deletion action that clears all keys with the given path prefix.
    KeyValueStoreUpdate KeyValueStoreUpdate.delete​(String key)
    Adds a new deletion action to the event.
    KeyValueStoreUpdate KeyValueStoreUpdate.storeAs​(String value, String... segments)
    Adds a new update action to the event that stores the given value on the path formed by the path segments.
    KeyValueStoreUpdate KeyValueStoreUpdate.update​(String key, String value)
    Adds a new update action to the event.
